actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-486.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the expenditure of certain existing funds of the Committee on Rules and Administration for an inquiry and investigation relating to the nomination of Gerald R. Ford as Vice President.

summary.text: Authorizes the expenditure of funds by the Senate Rules and Administration Committee for a study or investigation, including the procurement of individual consultants or organizations thereof, relating to the nomination of Gerald R. Ford of Michigan to be Vice President of the United States.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the expenditure of certain existing funds of the Committee on Rules and Administration for an inquiry and investigation relating to the nomination of Gerald R. Ford as Vice President.
